reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Joint evaluation of Support to Peace Building in Nepal

description.narrative: Joint evaluation takes place so that Denmark is the leader of the evaluation. Participants in the joint evaluation are those donors that have supported through different channels the peace building process in Nepal. Finland is one of these donors. It has b een agreed with Denmark that Finland would mount a separate outreach study on the impact of the support to the various peace building and human rights funds on the village and community level and on individual people in particular women. This separate stud y would be amalgamated in the actual evaluation as an input. The review would also contribute to our knowledge of Finland's suppor to the process of involving women in peace buildin.
